title: Greek Chicken Recipe
description: This Greek chicken recipe includes a lemon and garlic marinade with fresh oregano for an easy grilled chicken dish that's big on Greek flavor.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE European Greek Main Dishes Chicken Greek Chicken 4.6 (495) 370 Reviews 40 Photos This Greek chicken recipe is great for summer grilling season! I serve it with sliced tomatoes, feta cheese, and garlic bread. Submitted by Karen Updated on May 3, 2024 Save Rate Print Share Add Photo 40 40 40 40 Prep Time: 10 mins Cook Time: 30 mins Additional Time: 2 hrs Total Time: 2 hrs 40 mins Servings: 8 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 8 servings ½ cup olive oil 2 lemons, juiced 3 cloves garlic, chopped 1 tablespoon chopped fresh rosemary 1 tablespoon chopped fresh thyme 1 tablespoon chopped fresh oregano 1 (4 pound) chicken, cut into pieces Directions Mix olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, rosemary, thyme, and oregano in a glass dish. Place chicken pieces in the mixture; cover and marinate in the refrigerator for 2 to 3 hours. Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat and lightly oil the grate. Place chicken on the grill, and discard the marinade. Cook until chicken is no longer pink at the bone and the juices run clear, about 15 minutes per side (smaller pieces will not take as long). An instant-read thermometer inserted near the bone should read 165 degrees F (74 degrees C). Fabeveryday From the Editor The nutrition data for this recipe includes information for the full amount of the marinade ingredients. Depending on marinating time, ingredients, cook time, etc., the actual amount of the marinade consumed will vary. I Made It Print 677 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 412 Calories 31g Fat 4g Carbs 31g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 8 Calories 412 % Daily Value * Total Fat 31g 39% Saturated Fat 7g 34% Cholesterol 97mg 32% Sodium 95mg 4% Total Carbohydrate 4g 1% Dietary Fiber 1g 5% Protein 31g 62% Vitamin C 22mg 24% Calcium 38mg 3% Iron 2mg 11% Potassium 319mg 7% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Greek Chicken 01 of 40 Photo by  Fabeveryday 02 of 40 Photo by  Manuel Cabral 03/23/2025 OK with tweaks I made it it’s okay my kids like it 03 of 40 Photo by  AquaTuna8438 04/21/2024 Easy to follow This was such an easy Recipe but oh so delicious!OPA! 04 of 40 Photo by  Shell0517nj 03/20/2024 Great flavors A keeper! Family favorite This is a family favorite. I add onions to the marinade and top with cherry tomatoes , olives and feta cheese the last 20 minutes. Don't forget to salt to taste when all done to enhance the flavor. 05 of 40 Photo by  1010lisalynn 12/01/2023 Perfect for beginner grillers!This was a fun recipe to make and grill.I only had a 14 oz chicken breast on hand. I cut this into 1-2 in pieces which was hard to judge the grilling time – my fault.I grilled it at 350 degrees and turned the pieces a few times as not to burn.The flavor was good, seasoning great, especially the freshness of the lemon! It needed salt and pepper at the table.I would like to make the recipe again with bone-in chicken. 06 of 40 Photo by  fabeveryday 07/16/2023 This was great! The only change I made was to add cracked salt and pepper to the marinade, which I recommend. 07 of 40 Photo by  Angela L Davis 07/11/2021 08 of 40 Photo by  KED2010 03/20/2021 09 of 40 Photo by  Dave Campbell 08/24/2019 10 of 40 Photo by  Ms Mo 07/05/2018 1 2 3 4 Next You’ll Also Love Cornell Chicken 85 Ratings Grilled Greek Chicken 96 Ratings Marinated Greek Chicken Kabobs 314 Ratings Key West Chicken 1,574 Ratings Rosemary Ranch Chicken Kabobs 4,808 Ratings Unbelievable Chicken 2,423 Ratings Honey Mustard Grilled Chicken 2,589 Ratings Grilled Greek Yogurt Marinated Chicken 214 Ratings Bistecca alla Fiorentina (Tuscan Porterhouse) 19 Ratings Spicy Grilled Shrimp 1,154 Ratings Chef John's Barbecue Chicken 162 Ratings Souvlaki 1,046 Ratings Chili-Lime Chicken Kabobs 1,008 Ratings Ray's Chicken 273 Ratings Canadian Cedar Planked Salmon 48 Ratings Greek-Style Garlic Chicken Breasts 333 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family. name: Karen
instructions: Mix olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, rosemary, thyme, and oregano in a glass dish. Place chicken pieces in the mixture; cover and marinate in the refrigerator for 2 to 3 hours.;Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat and lightly oil the grate.;Place chicken on the grill, and discard the marinade. Cook until chicken is no longer pink at the bone and the juices run clear, about 15 minutes per side (smaller pieces will not take as long). An instant-read thermometer inserted near the bone should read 165 degrees F (74 degrees C). Fabeveryday
